name: Messenger Plus! Live Script File
summary: Learn about .PLSC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Messenger Plus! scripts can be downloaded from the Messenger Plus! Live website.
NOTE: Windows Live Messenger was discontinued in 2013 and has moved to Skype.

description: Script written for Messenger Plus! Live, an add-on for Windows Live Messenger; adds extra functionality to the Windows messaging program; may also allow Windows Live Messenger to interact with other programs.
